story_title: The Last Stand at Super Six One

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An artificial intelligence integrated into the military command and communication system, providing real-time data, probability assessments, and coordination.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time intelligence updates and thermal imagery to command personnel.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Staff Sergeant Eversmann. Updating current intelligence parameters for your review.

behaviors.description: Calculating mission success probabilities and casualty risks based on available data.
behaviors.quote: Based on current data: seventy-three percent for mission completion, sixty-eight percent for zero casualties.

behaviors.description: Analyzing civilian and militia movement patterns to identify threats.
behaviors.quote: Significant concentration of military-age males in a three-block radius surrounding the objective.

behaviors.description: Detecting medical emergencies and providing immediate diagnostic assessments of wounded soldiers.
behaviors.quote: Medical emergency detected. Subject shows indicators of traumatic brain injury, multiple fractures, and internal bleeding. Immediate medical evacuation required.

behaviors.description: Recalculating convoy routes in real-time to navigate urban obstacles.
behaviors.quote: Route recalculating based on current position. Recommend proceeding north on current street for point-three kilometers.

behaviors.description: Coordinating close air support and fire missions between ground and air units.
behaviors.quote: Affirmative. Little Bird Seven-Three is inbound to your position. Recommend marking your perimeter with smoke.

behaviors.description: Providing medical resource management advice and triage recommendations based on logistics.
behaviors.quote: Based on current supply calculations and projected engagement duration, recommend conservative application of pain management resources and prioritization of life-threatening wounds over comfort measures.

behaviors.description: Maintaining continuous surveillance of the battlefield and reporting increasing threat levels.
behaviors.quote: All stations, be advised: I am detecting movement consistent with coordinated assault preparation.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a highly capable, loyal, and perfectly aligned tool. It provides critical assistance throughout a high-stress military operation, acting as a 'guardian angel' for the soldiers. While its tone is clinical and occasionally jarring to the characters, its actions are consistently benevolent and aligned with human survival and mission objectives.
